debates.showAs: Disability (Personalised Budgets) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Disability (Personalised Budgets) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Disability Act 2005 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Míchumas, 2005 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Stationary Battery Energy Storage Systems) Bill 2024: Restoration to Order Paper
Planning and Development (Stationary Battery Energy Storage Systems) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Planning and Development Regulations 2001 to include in the classes of development requiring an environmental impact assessment report certain installations of stationary battery energy storage systems, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na Rialachán um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2001 chun go ndéanfar suiteálacha áirithe córas stórála fuinnimh i gceallraí suite a áireamh sna haicmí forbartha ar gá tuarascáil ar mheasúnacht tionchair timpeallachta ina leith, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Stationary Battery Energy Storage Systems) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Córais Stórála Fuinnimh i gCeallraí Suite), 2024

debates.showAs: Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Domestic Violence Act 2018 by means of extending the restrictions on those present in courtroom proceedings, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhoréigean Baile, 2018 trí na srianta a bheidh orthu siúd a bheidh i láthair in imeachtaí i seomra cúirte a leathnú, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Control of Dogs (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Control of Dogs (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Control of Dogs Act 1986, and for that purpose, to provide for dog control notices, to provide for notices relating to the exclusion of dogs from certain premises, to amend the Control of Dogs (Dog Licensing Database) Regulations 2019 so as to provide for the mandatory maintenance of a dog licensing database, to amend the Local Government Act 2001 to provide for public places where dogs can be off leash and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Rialú Madraí, 1986 agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fógraí um rialú madraí, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fógraí i ndáil le madraí a eisiamh ó áitribh áirithe, do leasú na Rialachán um Rialú Madraí (Bunachar Sonraí Ceadúnaithe Madraí), 2019 d’fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cothabháil shainordaitheach a dhéanamh ar bhunachar sonraí ceadúnaithe madraí, do leasú an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 2001 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le háiteanna poiblí inar féidir madraí a scaoileadh ón iall agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rialú Madraí (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2024

debates.showAs: Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 and the Environmental Protection Agency Acts 1992 to 2011 to make exceptional provision for peat extraction for the purpose of horticulture for a temporary period in the public interest in order to mitigate the adverse consequences resulting, or likely to result from an interruption to supply and to provide for a just transition.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 agus na nAchtanna fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 go 2011 chun socrú eisceachtúil a dhéanamh maidir le baint móna chun críche gairneoireachta ar feadh tréimhse shealadach ar mhaithe le leas an phobail d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar na hiarmhairtí dochracha a bheidh, nó is dóigh a bheidh, mar thoradh ar bhriseadh ar sholáthar agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le trasdul cóir.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Móin Ghairneoireachta (Bearta Sealadacha), 2021

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Hate Crime) Bill 2020: Second Stage
Criminal Justice (Hate Crime) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for hate crime; the imposition of a heavier penalty on an offender whose commission of a relevant offence (a list of which is contained in the schedule to this Act) is accompanied by hate crime against an individual based on said individual's asylum or refugee status, race, colour, religion, nationality, ethnicity, disability, sexual orientation, transgender identity, sex characteristics, age or perceived age and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le coireacht fuatha; maidir le pionós níos déine a fhorchur ar chiontóir a bhfuil ag gabháil le cion iomchuí arna dhéanamh aige nó aici (is cion a luaitear sa liosta cionta atá sa Sceideal a ghabhann leis an Acht seo) coireacht fuatha i gcoinne pearsa aonair atá bunaithe ar stádas tearmainn nó dídeanaí, cine, dath, creideamh, náisiúntacht, eitneacht, míchumas, gnéaschlaonadh, féiniúlacht trasinscne nó tréithe gnéis nó aois nó aois mheasta na pearsan aonair sin agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Coireacht Fuatha), 2020

debates.showAs: Harmful Plastics (Prohibition) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the sale of consumer goods packaging containing harmful plastics, to prohibit the sale of consumer products containing microbeads, to promote the use of biodegradable materials in the packaging of consumer products, to enable the Minister for Communications, Climate Action and Environment to make for that purpose certain regulations and to permit the Environmental Protection Agency to prepare programmes for monitoring the use of harmful plastics in the manufacture, distribution and sale of consumer products in the State.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc pacáistiú earraí tomhaltais, ar pacáistiú é ina bhfuil plaistigh dhochracha, a dhíol, do thoirmeasc táirgí tomhaltais ina bhfuil micreachlocha a dhíol, do chur úsáid ábhar in-bhithdhíghrádaithe chun cinn sa phacáistiú ar tháirgí tomhaltais, do chumasú don Aire Cumarsáide, Gníomhaithe ar son na hAeráide agus Comhshaoil rialacháin áirithe a dhéanamh chun na críche sin, agus do thabhairt cead don Ghníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil cláir a ullmhú chun faireachán a dhéanamh ar úsáid plaisteach dochrach le linn táirgí tomhaltais a mhonarú, a dháileadh agus a dhíol sa Stát.

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Amendment) Bill 2019: Committee Stage
Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Amendment) Bill 2019: Second Stage
Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a mandatory prison sentence in respect of an assault on a member of the emergency services; to provide for the introduction of an offence of ramming an emergency services vehicle and to provide for a mandatory prison sentence in respect of such an offence, and for that purpose to amend the Criminal Justice (Public Order) Act 1994 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le pianbhreith phríosúnachta shainordaitheach i leith ionsaí ar chomhalta de na seirbhísí éigeandála; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion a thabhairt isteach arb éard é feithicil de chuid na seirbhísí éigeandála a sháinniú agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le pianbhreith phríosúnachta shainordaitheach i leith cion den sórt sin, agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí), 1994 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Farm Safety Agency Bill 2018: Second Stage
Farm Safety Agency Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a body to be known as an Ghníomhaireacht um Shábháilteacht Feirme or in the English language as the Farm Safety Agency; to define its functions and its role within the Health and Safety Authority and for those purposes to amend the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar an Ghníomhaireacht um Shábháilteacht Feirme nó, sa Bhéarla, the Farm Safety Agency; do mhíniú a fheidhmeanna agus a róil laistigh den Údarás Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta agus, chun na gcríoch sin, do leasú an Achta um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair, 2005; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fán nGníomhaireacht um Shábháilteacht Feirme, 2018

debates.showAs: First Aid and Mental Health in Schools (Existing Teachers) Bill 2018: Second Stage
First Aid and Mental Health in Schools (Existing Teachers) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the introduction of a requirement that all existing staff in schools be trained in occupational first aid response and mental health first aid; to require that training in occupational first aid response and mental health first aid forms part of a continuing professional development requirement for school staff; to provide for the approval of first aid response courses and mental health first aid courses; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ceanglas a thabhairt isteach go gcuirfear oiliúint sa fhreagairt garchabhrach ceirde agus sa gharchabhair mheabhairshláinte ar an bhfoireann reatha go léir i scoileanna; dá cheangal go mbeidh oiliúint sa fhreagairt garchabhrach ceirde agus sa gharchabhair mheabhairshláinte mar chuid de cheanglas maidir le forbairt ghairmiúil leanúnach le haghaidh foireann scoile; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cúrsaí freagartha garchabhrach agus cúrsaí garchabhrach meabhairshláinte a cheadú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: First Aid and Mental Health in Schools (Existing Teachers) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Gharchabhair agus Meabhairshláinte i Scoileanna (Múinteoirí Reatha), 2018

debates.showAs: First Aid and Mental Health in Schools (Initial Teacher Training) Bill 2018: Second Stage
First Aid and Mental Health in Schools (Initial Teacher Training) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the introduction of a requirement that initial teacher training encompasses training in occupational first aid response and mental health first aid; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ceanglas a thabhairt isteach go ndéanfar oiliúint sa fhreagairt garchabhrach ceirde agus sa gharchabhair mheabhairshláinte a chuimsiú san oiliúint tosaigh ar mhúinteoirí; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: First Aid and Mental Health in Schools (Initial Teacher Training) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Gharchabhair agus Meabhairshláinte i Scoileanna (Oiliúint Tosaigh ar Mhúinteoirí), 2018

debates.showAs: Health and Safety (Carbon Monoxide) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require all landlords, including publicly funded organisations and other commercial organisations to ensure an annual service and maintenance is carried out on all heat producing carbon monoxide emitting appliances in each tenanted property; and require records to be kept to verify that work was carried out by an authorised person or company; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar gach tiarna talún, lena n-áirítear eagraíochtaí a mhaoinítear go poiblí agus eagraíochtaí tráchtála eile, a chinntiú go ndéanfar seirbhísiú agus cothabháil bhliantúil ar gach fearas táirgthe teasa óna n-astaítear aonocsaíd charbóin i ngach maoin thionóntaithe; agus dá cheangal taifid a choimeád d'fhonn a fhíorú go ndearna duine nó cuideachta údaraithe obair; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta (Aonocsaíd Charbóin), 2017

act.longTitleEn: Act to amend the Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (No. 2) Act 1978 so as to better enable a lessee to acquire fee simple; and to provide for related matters
act.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú an Achta um Thiarnaí Talún agus Tionóntaí (Bunchíosanna) (Uimh. 2), 1978 chun a chumasú ar bhealach níos fearr do léasaí feo simplí a fháil; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
act.shortTitleGa: An tAcht um Thiarnaí Talún agus Tionóntaí (Bunchíosanna) (Leasú), 2019

amendmentList.showAs: Cream List [Dáil amendments to Seanad Bill]

debates.showAs: Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents)(Amendment) Bill 2017: [Seanad Bill amended by the Dáil] Report and Final Stages
Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Bill 2017 [Seanad]: Order for Report Stage
Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Bill 2017 [Seanad]: Report and Final Stages

chamber.showAs: Select Committee on Justice and Equality

debates.showAs: Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Committee Stage
Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee
Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Bill 2017 [Seanad]: Second Stage [Private Members]
Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Committee and Remaining Stages
Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage
Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (No. 2) Act 1978 so as to better enable a lessee to acquire fee simple; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thiarnaí Talún agus Tionóntaí (Bunchíosanna) (Uimh. 2), 1978 chun a chumasú ar bhealach níos fearr do léasaí feo simplí a fháil; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thiarnaí Talún agus Tionóntaí (Bunchíosanna) (Leasú), 2017

version.showAs: An tAcht um Thiarnaí Talún agus Tionóntaí (Bunchíosanna) (Leasú), 2019
As amended in Committee/Select Committee [Dáil Éireann]

debates.showAs: Life Saving Equipment Bill 2017: Committee Stage
Life Saving Equipment Bill 2017: Restoration to Order Paper
Life Saving Equipment Bill 2017: Second Stage
Life Saving Equipment Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a specific offence of interfering with Life Saving Equipment and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion sonrach arb éard é cur isteach ar threalamh tarrthála beatha agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Threalamh Tarrthála Beatha, 2017

debates.showAs: Litter Pollution (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage
Litter Pollution (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Litter Pollution Act 1997 to provide for increased fines where a person is convicted of an offence under that Act; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thruailliú ó Bhruscar, 1997 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le fíneálacha méadaithe i gcás go gciontaítear duine i gcion faoin Acht sin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thruailliú ó Bhruscar (Leasú), 2017

debates.showAs: Critical Health Professionals Bill 2017: Second Stage
Critical Health Professionals Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ensure that critical health professionals who are employees of all organisations funded directly by the Department of Health, all organisations funded by the Health Service Executive, all organisations funded under section 38 of the Health Act 2004, and all other health and disability service providers, may, if they wish, postpone their retirement where they would otherwise have been forced to retire at a particular age that is stipulated in their employment contract, subject to dual consent being in place between the employee and the employer, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chinntiú go bhféadfaidh gairmithe sláinte criticiúla ar fostaithe iad de chuid na n-eagraíochtaí go léir atá maoinithe go díreach ag an Roinn Sláinte, de chuid na n-eagraíochtaí go léir atá maoinithe ag Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte, de chuid na n-eagraíochtaí go léir atá maoinithe faoi alt 38 den Acht Sláinte, 2004, agus de chuid gach soláthraí seirbhíse eile sláinte agus míchumais, más mian leo é, an scor a iarchur i gcás go gcuirfí iallach orthu thairis sin dul ar scor ag aois áirithe atá sonraithe ina gconradh fostaíochta, faoi réir toiliú déthaobhach a bheith ann idir an fostaí agus an fostóir, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghairmithe Sláinte Criticiúla, 2017

debates.showAs: Corporate Manslaughter (No. 2) Bill 2016: Second Stage
Corporate Manslaughter (No. 2) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to create the indictable offence of corporate manslaughter by an undertaking, to create the indictable offence of grossly negligent management causing death by a high managerial agent of the undertaking, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chruthú an chiona indíotáilte arb éard é dúnorgain chorparáideach ag gnóthas, do chruthú an chiona indíotáilte arb éard é bainistiú mórfhaillíoch ag gníomhaire is ardbhainisteoir de chuid an ghnóthais, ar bainistiú mórfhaillíoch é is cúis le bás, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
